version_description:

Do you like the app? Review us! Your feedback will help us to make Find Lost Device even better. Do you need support? Please write us to: support@1Dashcam.com

Hello,

since many of you requested this, this release includes:
- Location Services: Your location will be used to show the last known location of your saved devices.

We really hope that this helps you to find devices that are offline.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

P.S. Try the new dark mode in iOS 13 that we enabled in the last release : )

Hello,

since many of you requested this, this release includes:
- Location Services: Your location will be used to show the last known location of your saved devices.
- Bug fixes

We really hope that this helps you to find devices that are offline.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

P.S. Try the new dark mode in iOS 13 that we enabled in the last release : )

Hello,

since many of you requested this, this release includes:
- Location Services: Your location will be used to show the last known location of your saved devices.
- More bug fixes

We really hope that this helps you to find devices that are offline.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

P.S. Try the new dark mode in iOS 13 that we enabled in the last release : )

Hello,

this release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Have a nice week : )

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

this release includes improved iPad support.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

this release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Greetings from Berlin,

Hello,

Do you like our app? Please support us with a good review! Thanks : )

This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Greetings from Berlin,

Hello,

Thanks for using Wunderfind : )

This release includes more bug fixes and performance improvements.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

Thanks for all the feedback. This release includes:
- Renaming of devices
- Improved battery performance
- Other small bug fixes

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

I want to thank you all for your feedback. Wunderfind is really not perfect, but I try to make it better with every single update.

This release includes:
- Location Services Alert removed
- Improved battery performance
- Other small bug fixes

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

I would like to thank everybody that helped to improve the translations and sent me new feedback.

This release includes:
- Option to hide unnamed devices
- Improved translations
- Ability to delete per swipe
- Devices are no longer automatically saved
- Volume reset
- Option to tip and rate
- Other small bug fixes

More updates will follow soon : )

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

This release includes:
- Get a notification when your device was lost
- Improved UI: Tap the button with the three dots to switch between the radar and the map
- Other small bug fixes

Have a nice weekend!

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

Thanks for all your feedback!

This release includes:
- Custom distance unit
- Background location improvements
- Minor UI improvements
- Other small bug fixes

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

Please write a review for Wunderfind in the App Store. This would help me so much.

This release includes:
- Battery improvements
- Improved map view
- Better information when your device was last connected
- Improved Translations

Did you know that you can tap on the map to make it bigger? And a tap on the address below the map takes you right into Apple Maps.

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

P.S. More updates will follow soon : )

Hello,

Thanks for all your App Store reviews! This helps me so much.

This release includes:
- Bug fixes
- Improved translations
- Performance improvements

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

This release includes:
- Apple Watch Complication: receive a notification when you forget your iPhone
- Small UI improvements
- Improvements for AirPods Pro
- Improved FAQ section
- Measurement unit bug fix

I wish you all a Merry Christmas!

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

P.S. Join r/Wunderfind on Reddit to share your feedback and ideas.

Hello,

This release includes:
- Several bug fixes for the Apple Watch Complication
- Improved Apple Watch compatibility
- Updated metadata
- Other small bug fixes

Happy New Year!

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

This release includes:
- Improved translations: Thanks to all who helped me with this!
- Share the last known location: Tap on a device and then "..."
- Improved distance unit settings
- Improved UI for settings
- Other small UI improvements
- Other small bug fixes

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

What do you think about Wunderfind? Every single App Store review helps me to improve this app.

This release includes:
- Hide unnamed devices
- Improved UI for Wunderfind Pro
- Other small UI improvements
- Other small bug fixes

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik

Hello,

Thanks for all your App Store reviews! This helps me so much.

This release includes:
- Support for Siri Shortcuts
- Support for Home Screen Quick Actions
- New iMessage Sticker Pack
- Small UI improvements
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

Greetings from Berlin,
Hendrik
